name: SICK FILES: LILLY
description:
The "plot"

A couple wanted to have a nice day in the nearby forrest, but suddently everything went wrong. You in the role of the main character have to find the missing girl named Lilly. Take what you find to follow her traces and survive the lurking evil.

My intention

This is the early development progress of my approach on a survival horror game. I had a lot of fun to arrange the assets and to construct an idea of a story. Please comment below, in case you want to insert your ideas of how this game should be. Thank you in advance!

Some remarks

I made this demo with Unity using paid assets from the Unity Asset Store. Any donation is appreciated. It will be spend into further development.

Controls

W, S, A, D = Movement
Shift = Run
Space = Jump
LMouse = Shoot

Download and unzip

Due to the upload limit of 1GB i had to split the ZIP into 2 files. You can just download both and extract the first file with 7zip or similar tool. It should then automatically extract both files.
